website_summaries.verdict: Armed with a more stylish demeanor than classic Merrell shoes, the Rant Discovery Lace Canvas remains faithful to the brand by retaining its superb comfort and quality. The shoe also boasts of breathability and lightweight fit thanks to its canvas upper. These mentioned characteristics make it a perfect sneaker to keep you looking good and feeling good in the summer. Despite the shoe's few shortcomings Merrell fans persist on owning a pair due to its contemporary aesthetic and impeccable comfort.
pros: The Merrell Rant Discovery Lace Canvas is available in a number of colorway options
Comfortable was a frequent word used in describing this pair
Several shoe users commended it for offering excellent support
A few practical consumers liked the fact that it is versatile enough to pair with a wide range of casual outfits
Most of the purchasers found the sneaker to fit true to size
This shoe is more stylish than traditional Merrell footwear, according to the majority of the reviewers
A high number of wearers said that it is lightweight
The sneaker's canvas upper is breathable
cons: A handful of shoe users said that the outsole doesn’t last long
One reviewer found the shoelaces to be too short

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable well made shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm a UK 11 and always find I have to get 11.5 in merral shoes. I'm a merral convert I find them to make very comfortable shoes that are very supportive and these particular type are more practical than the usual shoe merral make as they are not so utilerterian looking
customer_reviews.author: Marc Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Poor fitting and questionable quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a pair of these shoes from Amazon a while back in a size 9 but found them a bit tight across the toes so I thought I’d try the next size up. The fit feels about 2 sizes too big and the quality was so different it would almost make you question the originality of the item. Very disappointed. The most expensive trying on of a pair of shoes ever by the time I paid postage both ways!!
customer_reviews.author: Gazza

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically they are okay, though slightly more shine to them than you'd think from the picture. Fit is fine, digging in at the ankle slightly but not too bad. Quality is where these fall down, I bought them as I'd had great success with Merrell shoes lasting me years previously - these are wearing thin on the soles after a few hours of strolling around city pavements. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Ale Co

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: These replace a pair of Merrell rants bought in 2018. The quality of materials used in the these new ones is really poor in comparison to the originals. The only redeeming feature is that they are still OK from a comfort perspective
customer_reviews.author: TeddyWFT

customer_reviews.title: spot on - fit, seem to get quite warm
customer_reviews.text: Like Merrell shoes and have had quite a few pairs. Took a day's wear to soften up a little but apart from that very comfortable. Do seem to get a little warm and i don't think it's just that it's been a warm couple of weeks - but i am being quite picky...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great Merrell trainers
customer_reviews.text: I brought these to replace a previous pair of Merrell trainers, so the fit was as expected and the look was good and the price excellent. Delivery was as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Graham McLachlan

customer_reviews.title: I am not a happy camper/hiker/customer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in black (granite). Received a damaged pair in the wrong colour... 🙄 Torn stitching at the front and visible signs of wear on the heels, soles and around the toes. They were a bit dirty on the sides too. Worst experience I’ve had with Amazon to date. At least I can refund them, although that’s going to take more of my free time... ugh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Got this pair for a good price, well constructed, feels good on the foot. Looks good, light. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: kestrel

customer_reviews.title: First pair faulty, replacements are being tried
customer_reviews.text: First pair, one of the orange soles wasn't bonded to the rest of the shoe properly and on second day of wearing had almost completely come off. Second pair are 1 day in, let's see...
customer_reviews.author: Will K

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality and true to size
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to other half, recived well, fantastic quality and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Cherish Watson

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expect from Merrell
customer_reviews.text: Merrell shoes I have bought in the past have been well made. However these shoes were flimsily made and the sole detached in less than 2 weeks use. Needless to say they were returned. They looked good, but they need to work.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: They fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 9.5 as that’s my size usually, they fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: Not sure these are real merrells. Seem very light and tge material is rubbish quality.
customer_reviews.author: jake kennedy

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Rant Discovery Lace Canvas Trainers
product_meta.description: These rant discovery lace shoes from Merrell feature canvas upper and textile inner material. The outsole is made out of synthetic. Secure all-star status on the streets with these high-performance sneakers.
feature_bullets: Kinetic Fit Base removable contoured insole for flexible support
Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
